 2017-16532017-12-14,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of PETER DHILLON, O.B.C., of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on November 29, 2019.
